DeleteLexicon.name: DeleteLexicon
DeleteLexicon.description: Deletes the specified pronunciation lexicon stored in an AWS Region

DescribeVoices.name: DescribeVoices
DescribeVoices.description: Returns the list of voices that are available for use when requesting speech synthesis.

GetLexicon.name: GetLexicon
GetLexicon.description: Returns the content of the specified pronunciation lexicon stored in an AWS Region.

GetSpeechSynthesisTask.name: GetSpeechSynthesisTask
GetSpeechSynthesisTask.description: Enables the user to get information about specific speech synthesis task.

ListLexicons.name: ListLexicons
ListLexicons.description: Returns a list of pronunciation lexicons stored in an AWS Region.

ListSpeechSynthesisTasks.name: ListSpeechSynthesisTasks
ListSpeechSynthesisTasks.description: Enables the user to list requested speech synthesis tasks.

PutLexicon.name: PutLexicon
PutLexicon.description: Stores a pronunciation lexicon in an AWS Region.

StartSpeechSynthesisTask.name: StartSpeechSynthesisTask
StartSpeechSynthesisTask.description: Enables the user to synthesize long inputs to provided S3 location.

SynthesizeSpeech.name: SynthesizeSpeech
SynthesizeSpeech.description: Synthesizes UTF-8 input, plain text or SSML, to a stream of bytes.
